clueList.clueInfo: Bring the gift and enter the passcode (4 digits):

clueList.clueDetail:
Lateral reading is the act of evaluating the credibility of a source by comparing it with other sources. Think about:
Source evaluation:
Look to see if someone else has already fact-checked the claim.
Go to the original source to understand the trustworthiness of the information
If you're still not sure about its trustworthiness even after you found the original source, read what other people say about the source itself (publication, author, organization).

clueList.clueInfo: You found a key in the chest!!!
A lot of fictions on this shelf. There is one book with a bookmark stood out.
clueList.clueDetail: One night about the time that Rebeca was cured of the vice of eating earth and was brought to sleep in the other children’s room, the Indian woman, who slept with them awoke by chance and heard a strange, intermittent sound in the corner. She got up in alarm, thinking that an animal had come into the room, and then she saw Rebeca in the rocker, sucking her finger and with her eyes lighted up in the darkness like those of a cat. Terrified, exhausted by her fate, Visitación recognized in those eyes the symptoms of the sickness whose threat had obliged her and her brother to exile themselves forever from an age-old kingdom where they had been prince and princess. It was the insomnia plague.  ---《One Hundred Years of Solitude》

clueList.clueInfo: It seems to be Dr.Green's bed. It's definitely wrong for me to walk around in his house like this...There are a few letters inside the nightstand.

clueDetail.White:
Dear Dr.Green,
I hope you have had a great subbatical! I currently work as a freelance journalist for PhiloNews. I am reaching out to know more about your new medicine. I have heard about this mysterious portion and I was wondering if I could have an interview with you when you have time. Thank you!
Best,
White
09/02
clueDetail.Susan-Yuan:
Hi Dr.Green,
As I mentioned earlier, you are welcome to stay here for as long as you would like. I have heard from Mary that your daughter has will celebrate her birthday in two days. Send my best regards!
Susan
09/01
clueDetail.Mr.Mustard:
Dear Dr.Green,
Did you receive the flowers? I asked several friends to get the sunflower in this season. I know it is a gift to someone so I make sure they are in good conditions. Anyway, did you remember last time you bought some mushrooms from me? I think I need to talk further about this with you. It will be great if you could tell the village what you have told me!
Thanks,
Mustard
09/04
clueDetail.Mary-Nightly:
Hi Green,
I hope you are enjoying your sabbatical. I remember last year today we had a big birthday party for Alina and I want to check in on you. Let me know how things are going! I hope she is enjoying her birthday as I am writing the letter!
Mary
09/05

clueList.clueInfo: This is the door to the hallway.
clueList.clueDetail: There must be clues that can lead me to the next door.

clueList.clueInfo: There are some flowers inside the wardrobe.
clueList.clueDetail: It looks like a art work made by sunflowers.

clueList.clueInfo: There are some flowers inside the wardrobe.
clueList.clueDetail: It looks like a art work made by chrysanths.

clueList.clueInfo: There is a piece of paper here.
clueList.clueDetail:
On the notebook: I talked to Alina today and she forgot it is her birthday today. I told her to stay positive but I can't even put on a smile. I buried myself in my lab the whole day. I hope she will get happier when she sees the flowers. ---09/??

The date is hard to read due to the handwritting style.

hint: It seems to be Dr. Green's bedroom.
